title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Comprehensive certification covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and database management. Completed 300+ coding challenges and 5 comprehensive projects.

title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
description: Advanced JavaScript concepts including ES6+ features, algorithms, data structures, functional programming, and object-oriented programming principles.

title: React Developer Certification
description: Professional certification in React development covering hooks, state management, component lifecycle, testing, and advanced React patterns and best practices.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Comprehensive training in responsive web design principles, CSS Grid, Flexbox, media queries, and accessibility standards for modern web development.

title: Node.js Application Development
description: Professional certification in Node.js development including Express.js, REST APIs, authentication, database integration, and deployment strategies.

title: MongoDB Developer Certification
description: Professional certification covering MongoDB fundamentals, aggregation framework, indexing strategies, data modeling, and performance optimization.

title: Git and GitHub Essentials
description: Comprehensive training in version control systems, Git workflows, collaborative development, branching strategies, and GitHub best practices.

title: Web Security Fundamentals
description: Essential web security practices including authentication, authorization, data validation, HTTPS, and protection against common vulnerabilities.

title: Agile Development Practices
description: Training in Agile methodologies, Scrum framework, sprint planning, user stories, and collaborative development practices for efficient project delivery.

title: TypeScript Fundamentals
description: Comprehensive TypeScript training covering type systems, interfaces, generics, decorators, and advanced TypeScript features for scalable applications.
